name: Epic Epoc
description:
Git Repo: https://github.com/jh318/ld36

Shoot stuff to get points. If stuff touches your hut you lose points.

Arrows & Space to move

zxcvbasdfgqwert to shoot stuff

Solo project made in a weekend for the Ludum Dare 36 Game Jam. Presented here in all its jank and glory.

Music Credits

Remix: Me using FL Studio

Original:

Game System: Gameboy Advance
Game Name: Super Robot Taisen Original Generation (Japan)
Song Title: Theme Of Elzam V. Branstein - "TROMBE!"
Sequenced by: Tsu Ryu
Song Originally Composed by: Hanaoka Takuya
www.vgmusic.com/file/923b71ce2918…ea6dc4acdb24.html
